sentences.sContent: We three formed a little literary coterie.
sentences.sContent_eng: We three formed a little literary coterie.
sentences.sCn: 我们三人组成一个小文学团体。

synos.tran: 圈内人；小集团；伙伴；同志

remMethod.val: 来自cote(小屋， 笼) + rie → 一个屋子里的人 → 小团体

trans.tranOther: a small group of people who enjoy doing the same things together, and do not like including others
